statement.p:
A {{object_1}} {{object_1_orientation}} and a {{object_2}} is attached cleanly {{object_2_orientation}} of the {{object_1}}. The dimensions of the shape are as follows: {{dimensions}}, where everything is measured in {{units_long}}.
Sketch a drawing of this situation to the best of your ability.
Find the total volume of this shape.

answer.p: The volume is V \approx {{total_volume}} {{units_short}}^3. This was computed using the formula V = {{formula}}.
